name: One Arm Triceps Extensions on Cable
how_to_perform:
1. Hold a cable handle with one hand, keeping your arm straight and your upper arm against your side.
2. Keeping your core engaged and your body stable, extend the cable outward by straightening the cable, fully extending your arm.
3. Slowly lower the weight back down to the starting position without swinging or jerking the cable.
4. Repeat on the other side.
short_summary: One Arm Triceps Extensions on Cable is an isolation exercise that works the triceps muscle in a single arm.
